name: Hard Disk Image
summary: Learn about .HDI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The PC-98 was often used for Japanese computers. Therefore, HDI files may be localized in Japanese unless translated.

description: Disk image file used by emulation software for older NEC PC-98 computer systems, including Anex86 and T98-Next; often contains older PC-98 video games and allows them to be run in Windows with the supporting emulation software.
